summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Government Performance and Financial Management Committee of the Dallas City Council is convening on April 23, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Briefing Room, City Hall. The meeting will be held both in-person and via video conference, with the purpose of discussing key financial management topics, budget adjustments, and performance evaluations.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the March 25, 2024, meeting.
2. Review of city real estate for development and redevelopment opportunities.
3. Discussion of FY24 mid-year appropriation adjustments.
4. Briefings on the planned budget for FY 2024-25 from various city departments, including Government Affairs, Procurement Services, and Risk Management.
5. Updates from the City Auditor on internal audit reports and a budget accountability report.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the review of real estate opportunities and adjustments to the mid-year budget. The meeting will also cover the upcoming agenda item regarding the Dallas Water Utilities billing system, as well as an audit of the Small Business Center focused on minority and women-owned business enterprises.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the meeting minutes and discussion on the proposed budget adjustments and departmental plans for FY 2024-25. Additionally, the committee will consider recommendations based on the internal audit reports and budget accountability findings. 

This meeting is crucial for ensuring financial transparency and effective management of city resources.
